newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: SOCCER-RONALDO NAMED FIFA PLAYER OF YEAR.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-RONALDO NAMED FIFA PLAYER OF YEAR.

text.p: Barcelona's Brazilian striker Ronaldo was named FIFA's World Player of the Year on Monday.
Ronaldo beat off competition from Newcastle's Alan Shearer and AC Milan's George Weah in a poll of more than 100 national team coaches.
Ronaldo received 329 points under the poll's voting system, against 140 for Weah, last year's winner, and 123 for Shearer, according to a FIFA statement ahead of the award ceremony.
The Brazilian, regarded by many as the most exciting player to emerge since Diego Maradona, is top scorer in the Spanish first division this season with 15 goals.
Barcelona were so impressed with him that they gave him a 10-year contract.
